TopicTitle: Show off your awesome KSP pictures!

Articles.Content: Jeb always seems soo happy

who broke the camera???

Edited October 30, 2013 by moraruÃ¢â€žÂ¢
Where do you guys load your images to? I have a few images I'd like to post.

Where do you guys load your images to? I have a few images I'd like to post.

Most people use a public image-sharing service like Imgur or Photobucket, which require you to register a free account in order to upload images.

Most people use a public image-sharing service like Imgur or Photobucket, which require you to register a free account in order to upload images.

Thank you.

Jebediah in his snazzy new lander. Sadly, he lacked the dv to get off Mun, and has become a permanent resident. This was taken long before he found out he couldn't get home by crashing into Mun at roughly 350m/s.
Ike's North Pole

SOME of you might recognize this insane... Neutron Star thing I created back in 0.18, for reasons.

BUT!

I re-did it!

And now it actually looks like a neutron star!

It's actually kinda ominous.

Great model but shouldn't a Neutron star be white since they should (theoretically at least) radiate the same energy in all the visible spectrum?

And I think it should be smaller as well due to the extreme gravitation.

/my 2 cents

Edited October 30, 2013 by lewille
Bob made it to the mun! (and back ^^)

Bye bye wings!

This is one way to change balance after your fuel is used up.

I haven't unlocked other wing parts yet.

Wetlands!

That's Uluru in the background, from the looks of things. The kerbal version.

That's Uluru in the background, from the looks of things. The kerbal version.

Lost Eden fan?

The L6 lander series. A bit odd looking but works well.

One last Mun hop before heading back to Kerbin. And Bill did make it back :-)

Behold; Epic Areobraking failiure over Eve!

The ship is made out of loads of metal panels connected by small docking ports,

by assigning these ports to action groups I can cause them to disconnect in sequence and create this awesome effect!

<iframe class="imgur-album" width="100%" height="550" frameborder="0" src="http://imgur.com/a/Bw35T/embed"></iframe>

Hyperedit was used by the way, I am never going to get that thing all the way to eve without it

After building loads structures in this way; Satellites, Probes, Space stations and so on, I think I will combine footage of them into one destructive video!

by assigning these ports to action groups I can cause them to disconnect in sequence and create this awesome effect!

Man that looked awesome! I'd love to see actual footage of it happening, would be a lot more epic with some tense music in the background

Man that looked awesome! I'd love to see actual footage of it happening, would be a lot more epic with some tense music in the background

How could I not put epic music in the background. Also, I just found Kerb-cam's Slow Motion Feature...

My apollo try

Diameters 11, 6.5, 5, and 3.75 ( Fairing)

the craft itself is ol' 2.5m.

and

getting that beast to orbit was kind of accomplishment.

Too bad game crashes close to the mun ):.
science drop on dres.

Jeb gets really bored during slow parachute descents. He'd already cut one parachute to speed things up, but that was still too slow so he jumped out about 100m up and was on the ground before the pod.
he probly didn't even turn around to see the pod land. what a badass.

Behold; Epic Areobraking failiure over Eve!

The ship is made out of loads of metal panels connected by small docking ports,

by assigning these ports to action groups I can cause them to disconnect in sequence and create this awesome effect!

Hyperedit was used by the way, I am never going to get that thing all the way to eve without it

After building loads structures in this way; Satellites, Probes, Space stations and so on, I think I will combine footage of them into one destructive video!

Man that does look cool, and nice job on thinking that up lol

But recently (for whatever reason) ive been watching documentaries on Shuttle Columbia and that creepily reminded me of it somewhat ....small bits fall off then bigger then the whole thing destabilizes and breaks up in a instant....

science drop on dres.

Droppin' dem science beats, yo.

wha.....wha.... WHAT IS IT??

also a pretty picture of Kerbin, KSC down below, The Mun rising to the East and my lander probe bound for Gilly

What mod is that engine in????

What mod is that engine in????

That is the Novapunch 2.5m NERVA.

It is also one of the first NERVA engines ever made in KSP and dates back quite a few versions.
The International Research Station with its newly attached solar-arrays!

The International Research Station with its newly attached solar-arrays!

Pictures do not download from personal computer. You need to place them on a hosting site such as Imgur and use the link feature to paste them in your post.

Unusual atmospheric effect in Kerban orbit.

I'm pretty new to this game so I don't know much about mods, but good grief how did you get it to look so good? (kerbin texture etc)

theres a mod in the add-on development forum. Adds city lights as well as clouds. That's Laythe in the pictures.
